source_objects.title: Digital Marketing
source_objects.description: Advance your digital marketing skills with great courses that teach you digital marketing strategy and tactics.

items.title: 31 Days of Online Marketing Ideas
items.headline: Ideas and Tools For Sharing Your Expertise Online
objectives_summary: Discover a number of ways to market your business online.
Decide which of the tips you might want to try.
Try online tools to help you market online.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Online Training Courses For Beginners

items.headline: Online Marketing - create a digital marketing funnel online and grow your business and sales with automated marketing
objectives_summary: Understand how to create an online digital marketing strategy that works
Understand the AIDA Marketing Funnel system of online marketing
Set up your own AIDA Marketing Funnel for your business or your clients

items.title: Get on TV & Radio For Authors: The Complete Program

visible_instructors.job_title: Award-Winning Media Expert Coach, Author and Journalist
visible_instructors.title: Kristen White

items.headline: How To Make Great Money, Get More Clients & Share Your Message (By Harnessing The Power Of Multi-Channel Media)
objectives_summary: Utilize video, web, and mobile technology to skyrocket your success
Look and FEEL prepared, relaxed and confident on camera, radio, and in every business interaction
Have the experts in your industry (or any industry) take your calls and connect with you as an equal

items.title: OptimizeMember Success - The Missing Manual Training
items.headline: Create your profitable membership site - step by step. OptimizePress expert shares best practice and pitfalls to avoid.
objectives_summary: Follow Step by step instructions - all you need to go from a bare WordPress Install to a Fully functioning Payment Taking Membership Site
3 ways to organise your membership site
How to best use access levels and packages

items.title: Turn Your MA or PhD Thesis Into a Best Selling Book
items.headline: From thesis to published book in 30 days
objectives_summary: Transform your research into a best-selling book.
Take your research, repackage it into something anybody would want to read, upload it to Amazon, and begin selling it on the world's largest bookstore.
Use the best-seller book launch sequence to make your book dominate any Amazon category.

items.title: Rock Your Newsletter
items.headline: The 'Rock Your Newsletter' course enables you to quickly learn how to set up a newsletter and grow your audience.
objectives_summary: Recognize the importance of growing a mailing list for your business and its value in terms of increased revenue
Know how to set up a mailing list from scratch using a free provider (up to 2000 subscribers)
Understand how to create the opt-in form to add to your website, blog or social media so that people can sign up for your newsletter

items.title: The Accelerated Digital Marketing Course: From Zero To Hero
items.headline: The Step By Step Guide For Rapidly Picking A Niche And Creating A Digital Product (Even If You Have No Expertise)
objectives_summary: Identify what it takes to get started (even on a shoestring budget).
Correctly pick the proper niche (even if you don't know where to get started).
How to target and speak to your PERFECT audience.

items.title: Get Started Online With No Investment - Newbie Friendly
items.headline: Find the exact strategies needed to get started online - with no investments required!
objectives_summary: drive laser-targeted traffic to a website or offer for free
build a massive subscriber list of buyers
add lots of powerful traffic strategies to your marketing arsenal

objectives_summary: Improve your podcasting voice!

items.title: Website Traffic Domination - How I got 2367+ visitors/day
items.headline: Website Traffic - Learn how I've managed to drive up to 2367+ visitors/day to my website and how you can do it to!
objectives_summary: How to chose the right methods of traffic for rocking their business
